comment.author: 103580154@N07
comment._content: in the foreground it's possible to see the Pyramid of Cestius that was built in the 12th century B.C. It's the tomb of Gaius Cestius, a magistrate and member of one of the four great religious corporation in Rome.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for the information about the Pyramid of Cestius in this image. We will add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
